reviews.title: Pricey but totally worth it
reviews.review_text: Used this for my first baby and never had diaper rash issues. Noticed how much more expensive it was compared to other brands so I tried a different brand for my second baby. She immediately developed a rash, so I went back to this and it cleared everything up right away. This is the best diaper cream!

reviews.title: BEST DIAPER CREAM! You won't be disappointed!
reviews.review_text: This diaper cream is HANDS DOWN the absolute BEST on the market! I have bought every brand possible and this Honest brand is the only one that clears my baby's rash within the first use! Even when he has had really bad rashes it always works!

reviews.title: Love this Cream. Most Recent Batch seems Better.
reviews.review_text: I've been using this diaper cream since my LO was born in January. We've never had a diaper rash so far. We typically use it after every dirty diaper and before bedtime. I did have a few batches that were watery and almost chunky as people have also stated in the most recent past, however my most current order did not have this issue. It was well incorporated, not watery or unusually messy, and seemed more chemically together than some past batches I've used. I can't say whether they've returned to their old formula as I wasn't using it when it was actively in use, but it did seem more like a traditional cream in texture than before.

reviews.title: Diaper rash cream- a little goes a long way!
reviews.review_text: This diaper rash cream is the best! It has all natural ingredients including zinc to help heal and it goes on smoothly. It works great on babies all the way up to adults - highly recommend!!

reviews.title: Diaper rash cream
reviews.review_text: Works fast with to side effects. Great product.

reviews.title: Expired
reviews.review_text: Buy these all the time from Publix and Walgreens, but tried it from Walmart and I received an expired one.

reviews.title: Smells good!
reviews.review_text: Smells good. I'm not sure if it works as good as max strength desitin. Usually when I'm dealing with rashes it's because my 22 month old has tummy problems so there's diarrhea often. He has a milk allergy. And if he even gets some by accident it can affect him for quite a while after. So I usually just default to the powerful stuff or magic diaper cream I made myself. A pharmacy will tell you how to make this stuff! You can either use a fungal cream in it or not depending on the rash. Back again to the product though it does spread on nicely and I do enjoy that it doesn't smell like some type of petroleum product.

reviews.title: Diaper cream
reviews.review_text: The diaper rash cream we have used it since she was born but this diaper cream has given her a rash please go back to the original diaper cream

reviews.title: New formula not as good
reviews.review_text: The old formula worked really well, new formula is not as effective and seems watered down, it does not work at all… will be buying a new brand if the old formula does not come back very disappointing because I love this brand overall.

reviews.title: Nothing else worked!
reviews.review_text: My daughter had a rash so bad that her bottom started bleeding. We tried everything, Desitin, Mary's baby multipurpose ointment , natural baby remedies, Pinxav, etc NOTHING ELSE WORKED. Honest, diaper rash, cream is the only thing that brought relief and healing for my baby girl's bottom. I would highly recommend to any friend looking for the best diaper cream out there!

I ordered this after being recommended after I had back surgery. Took the company 4 days to process my order and only was after I sent them an email asking them why they were not mailing it. Than it took extra day to get it to me. Product did not work for what I needed it to help with.

reviews.title: Disappointed with the Change in Formula
reviews.review_text: I've been using this diaper rash cream for my second child, who's now 4 months old. We immediately noticed that the packaging and texture were different from when we used it for our first child just 3.5 years ago. For the past 2.5 months, we've been dealing with a mild diaper rash, visiting the doctor twice to have the rash cultured and giving extra air time to help with healing. Despite all this, we've only seen minimal improvement. Curious about the difference, I found an old tube of the Honest Diaper Rash Cream and compared the ingredients. After reading through older reviews, it became clear that the formula has changed. Sadly, the new formula hasn't been effective in protecting my baby's skin. We've decided to discontinue use, and after just two days, we've already seen noticeable improvement. If you're experiencing similar issues, I recommend trying other products first before sticking with this one.

reviews.title: Solid diaper rash cream
reviews.review_text: I ended up not using this cream as much as the all-purpose balm, but I keep it in the diaper backpack for on-the-go use as it's a very reliable, good quality, for sensitive skin diaper rash cream that saves the sweet bum from high humidity, diaper rash, or any other unwanted reactions!

reviews.title: Heals!
reviews.review_text: This cream has cleared up all Diaper Rashes overnight. Using the Honest Brand Diapers, i have yet to go through a whole tube. I have bought a new one with each baby but never finished one. Rashes normally only come from super acidic poops, but this cream would heal it up before the next change!

reviews.title: Great rash cream!!
reviews.review_text: My baby is very sensitive. Which is why I am an honest shopper... However, at times, she still gets diaper rashes. This cream has been amazing. It helps to heal rashes quickly and it is also a good preventive measure. I definitely recommend this rash cream.

reviews.title: Only Honest for us
reviews.review_text: I swear by this product. While my son was at daycare one day, he ran out of this product (which I found out later). Turns out his daycare provider decided to use Desitin out of another baby's bag. Once we got home I noticed red welts all over his diaper area. I immediately gave him a bath to wash the Desitin off and caked him in the Honest Diaper Rash Cream. It soothed his skin and the welts disappeared after a few hours. NEVER will I use another diaper rash cream. Only Honest for us!

reviews.title: Best Cream!
reviews.review_text: Best diaper rash cream for sensitive skin!! My two older kids always struggled with very sensitive skin and the third time around I came across this and will never to back! It's not too thick and soaks in well making clean up the next diaper change simple and none painful for your baby.

reviews.title: Pricey for the size, but worth it
reviews.review_text: I was looking for something more natural so I decided to try this. So far, I've only had to apply it once or twice before the rash has cleared. The texture is nice, it spreads well, and it comes off my finger easily after. It doesn't work with the swippen snap which is a real bummer, but oh well.

reviews.title: Diaper cream
reviews.review_text: The diaper cream is the best for baby's bottom, never had a cream that worked so well

reviews.title: Good product
reviews.review_text: Very good product! The irritation cleared up quickly.
i did not receive the item because i had to cancel my order

reviews.title: Great Cream
reviews.review_text: I like the lightweight texture of the cream. Also I enjoy the clean smell that lingers after you put it on the baby. Overall, I like the cream and look forward to one day they offer it in a larger size bottle

reviews.title: Best rash cream ever
reviews.review_text: My 8th month old daughter sleeps on her tummy so all her pee and everything sits in the front so she gets bad rashes. After one use I see a big difference I absolutely recommend this butt cream!

reviews.title: Grainy, not smooth
reviews.review_text: I have purchased this product before and loved it. So I recently purchased several more to have them at home when needed. Unfortunately, the tube I recently opened from this purchase is very grainy. The first bottle I tried was smooth and lovely.

reviews.title: Effective product
reviews.review_text: Natural easy to put on and rash disappears quickly even if she is just a little irritated it a product I always want on hand.Highly recommended to buy.

reviews.title: Still in the running for America's Next Top Aunt!
reviews.review_text: I purchased for one nephew's 2-year-son and for another nephew's 5-year-old and 6-month-old daughters. Both sets of parents have marveled at the improvements. Thanks for keeping me a contender.
Not just for babies. Senior with lichen sclerosus (LS). Use daily to control symptoms. Baby oiintment / diaper cream suggested by gynecologist, it works well for me.

reviews.title: Love love love
reviews.review_text: When I discovered this baby rash cream it works wonders for my babies bottom! My baby has not gotten any rashes while using this and does not irritate his skin.

reviews.title: Smells amazing
reviews.review_text: I've never used a diaper rash cream that smelt as good as this one and isn't toxic on my newborn! I love the slight essential oil smell and that it gets the job done. No diaper rashes around here!

reviews.title: CAUSED A BLISTERING RASH
reviews.review_text: This product gave my 14 month old a HORRIBLE, blistering rash. THREE SEPARATE TIMES. The first 2 times, I made excuses thinking maybe something else caused it, but no. Since he was born, I've applied diaper rash cream on his booty every night before bed to PREVENT him from getting a rash. It's always done the job until I switched to honest. My poor baby screams in pain every time I have to change his diaper because of this product. Diaper rash cream should NOT be the cause of a rash. It's a shame. We love so many of honest's products because they're cleaner than others but this one is going in the trash.

reviews.title: Horrible formula change.
reviews.review_text: When I ordered this I thought they'd given me the wrong product. I raved about their old diaper rash cream, we've used it for over a year and no diaper rash. I've used this a few times and my little one is waking up pink. It's super runny, I'm looking for a different cream because I'm positive she's going to get a rash if I keep using this.

reviews.title: Please bring old formula back
reviews.review_text: I purchased the rash cream which I have used for all 4 of my kiddos. What I thought was just new packaging ended up being a new formula. Runny, doesn't smell as good and did not help my baby's rash any longer. I returned the creams and had to move on to a different company for rash creams. I still don't like the new creams I'm using as much as the old Honest Co one. Please listen to all of the moms here and bring back the old formula.

reviews.title: Ingredient Changes Ruin Product
reviews.review_text: I am a 62 year old with a digestive health issue that sometimes requires me to use a diaper rash cream. I have tried many of the popular brands. They burned when applied. Honest was the first brand that did the job and did not burn. I have happily used it for several years. While away on vacation, I found myself in need of a cream.. I couldn't find Honest. I purchased something with similar ingredients. Brand new out of the box, the ingredients had separated into a gooey mess. I got my money back, but was miserable for the rest of the trip. . I returned home planning to purchase a spare tube of Honest Diaper Rash Cream to keep for travel only to find the ingredients had changed. Instead of a list of almost all natural ingredients, I found ingredients like Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacladipate-2 which is a synthetic emollient along with at least 8 or 9 other non-organic ingredients. It doesn't feel the same as my other tube of Honest Cream. It doesn't smell the same. I am very disappointed. I had been giving a tube of Honest Diaper Rash Cream to mothers at baby showers. I will be calling them to warn them about the changes. I do not know what I will do when my last tube of the original formula of Honest Diaper Rash Cream runs out.

reviews.title: I love this cream !!
reviews.review_text: Complimentary from thehonestcompany I absolutely love this diaper cream from The Honest Company! It has no fragrance, which is a huge plus for me, as I prefer products without added scents. It's incredibly gentle on my baby's skin and provides great protection without causing irritation. I also really appreciate the clean, safe ingredients, knowing I'm using something natural and trustworthy. I feel confident and safe using it on my little one!

reviews.title: Do NOT buy - horrid
reviews.review_text: This is an absolutely terrible runny yukky useless cream. Where is the blue amazing creamy thick old lavender smelling formula? This is not what I had in mind. 3+ years of use and happiness and then there is this? Why on earth would you replace an amazing product with this terrible product? I'll never buy anything else from this company - talk about cutting down on quality.

reviews.title: It's a yes from me
reviews.review_text: I love the honest company so I knew I had to try the zinc oxide cream. This is a staple for any mom's cabinet as it can be used on multiple things not only diaper rash. My kids are all out of diapers and I like to use this on any scrapes cuts Burns or even skin irritation. This multipurpose cream is amazing. It goes on white but rubs in clear. Gifted by the honest company.

reviews.title: Love it's soothing and moisturizing
reviews.review_text: The diaper rash cream is a must have at my home now. It's fragrance free so one less thing to worry about irritations. I found it's moisturizing and soothing at the same time. I like to use a dime sized amount as needed. So far both my baby and I are happy about it. Gifted by Honest.

reviews.title: Soothing
reviews.review_text: complimentary from the honest company. Very gentle and fragrance free which I very much appreciate. This cream is moisturizing and soothing on my baby's skin. It also helps relieve diaper rash redness. I know my baby feels more comfortable with each application.

reviews.title: Disappointed in formula change
reviews.review_text: Really disappointed in the formula change. My little ones also have been developing rash since change in product. It's a bummer that a great company decided to change something so critical to have trust in. The consistency is now runny and the formula overall creates too much moisture which I believe contributes to irritation and rash.

reviews.title: Love
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product and works great on my baby's skin. This brand is so amazing and the fact that they include clean products that will not be damaging to my baby skin and it's made for sensitive skin so everything that I've tried so far is great in this product is no exception it applies great and it gets removed great. Complimentary from the honest company

reviews.title: They changed the formula, We STOPPED Buying!
reviews.review_text: The new formula is garbage. They need to bring back the old diaper cream. Our kids have sensitive skin and the old formula worked wonders where other creams failed. We also loved how thick the old cream was, as well as all the natural ingredients! Way better!

reviews.title: Love the added protection
reviews.review_text: We love using all Honest products. This sensitive everyday diaper rash cream is fragrance free. It has zinc oxide skin protection and soothing phyto-blend. For us this works very well and we will continue to use on our girl. Gifted by the honest company.

reviews.title: Caused a rash - bring back the old formula!
reviews.review_text: I recently purchased the new “Everyday diaper rash cream” and my 1 year old immediately got a really bad rash, I had to stop using it immediately. I am very disappointed that I can no longer buy the original “Honest diaper rash cream”, as this was perfect and never gave my baby a rash - on the contrary it cured rashes very quickly. Please bring back the old formula! Your products are supposed to be as natural as possible and this new formula is a big step away from that.

reviews.title: Formula Changed
reviews.review_text: The new formula is terrible. We went over a year with our baby having zero diaper rash with this cream. Now it seems like every few weeks once the formula has changed she getting diaper rash. What we like about the old formula is it wasn't runny and it was sensitive enough to use for our baby. Not sure what they changed, but PLEASE change it back!

reviews.title: great for sensitive skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Honest Diaper Rash Cream, Sensitive complimentary in exchange for my honest experience, and it has quickly become a must-have in my baby's diaper bag. My little one has sensitive skin, and this cream works wonders in soothing irritation and preventing diaper rashes. The texture is thick but spreads easily, creating a protective barrier without feeling greasy. I also love that it's made with clean, gentle ingredients and is free from harsh chemicals. Within just a few applications, I noticed a significant improvement in my baby's skin. It's definitely a product I'll continue using and recommending to other parents. I got this Complimentary from thehonestcompany.

reviews.title: Was good now it's terrible.
reviews.review_text: We've been using the “blue tube” it was amazing, the past 2 years no problems, it helped every butt rash. The new “green tube” is garbage. My baby has had a worsening rash for the last 3 weeks and I read the rest of the reviews and ding ding ding everyone is having. The same problem. If you find the blue tube at a store I would buy it. Do not purchase the green, even the consistency is trash.

reviews.title: Please bring back the old formula
reviews.review_text: I used to use this cream in a variety of ways for my daughter. She has very sensitive skin and breaks out in ezcema rashes from time to time. The old formula was amazing. After a 3 week breakout that covered half her body, and trying numerous eczema creams, the old formula of this diaper rash cream was the ONLY thing that cleared it up. I am SO sad that they changed the formula. It is no longer effective. This is the only thing that healed my daughters skin and now I'm at a loss. I assume this change was done in an attempt to go vegan, but they truly missed the mark. Some things are better left alone and this is one of them. It's sad when a company sacrifices quality to fit into a "box". I'm all for using ethical products when it makes sense, but this product worked so well in its original formula. Please please please bring back the old formula!!! I beg of you.

reviews.title: New formula is awful
reviews.review_text: My poor daughter has been having a horrible rash ever since switching to the “new formula”. No where on the packaging did it indicate it was changed. After a month of her rash I realized is was from the cream. She had such horrible diaper rash she bled! Her rash is still healing since switching, but improving. Never thought I would have such a problem with honest brand…

reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
reviews.review_text: This diaper rash cream is a great choice for babies with sensitive skin. It has a thick, soothing formula with zinc oxide that creates a strong barrier against moisture while helping to heal irritation. The ingredients are gentle, fragrance-free, and plant-based, making it a safe option for daily use. It absorbs well without feeling too greasy and provides quick relief for redness and discomfort. However, it may take a little extra effort to spread due to its thicker consistency. Overall, it's an effective, clean option for protecting delicate skin. It was gifted to me by honest Company.

reviews.title: Not a fan of the new formula
reviews.review_text: Really bummed to find that they changed the formula on this! This was my go-to for skin healing (not just diaper rash). The old formula was a great blend of skin healing and soothing herbs without any extras (Ifor reference I'm an herbalist). I recommended it all around. Hopefully they're able to revive the old formula!

reviews.title: New product SEPARATES very OILY, cannot use!
reviews.review_text: NOOO... what happened to the original blue/white diaper cream?! That one was the best diaper cream! Bought this one because I couldn't find the original one anymore, and this new one is terrible! It separates and comes out part cream and part oil! I can't even use it... why change a product that was so great? Very disappointed. d

reviews.title: New formula is awful
reviews.review_text: New formula is terrible. Please do not buy this product as it's no longer what it used to be. The old formula/packaging was the best and only cream I used for my two kids as it was thick, effective and safe. The new formula is runny, separates and irritates both my kids' skin.. how disappointing that so many loyal customers and families like mine now dislike this brand, and have to find a new company to purchase from since they ruined this amazing product.

reviews.title: What is happening to The Honest Company?
reviews.review_text: Did you think we wouldn't notice? The old formula had healthy & lovely ingredients, but this new formula is garbage. I used to trust Honest, but now I have to take the time to Google all of the cheap junk they are putting in their products. You keep raising prices AND changing good/ trusted products into cheap quality products. You need to be more 'Honest' with your loyal customers!

reviews.title: New formula is TERRIBLE
reviews.review_text: This has been my favorite diaper cream for years even before having a baby myself my mom used it on my sister and it was great. Got a new bottle last week for my baby and it was terrible. This new formula is super watery and just bad! Game my baby a rash!!!! And it suck bc it's not cheap! Please go back to the old one!

reviews.title: No Good
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately, this new formula is a huge disappointment. The old formula has been a constant in our home the last 7 years through 3 babies and toddlers, I even used it on cracked/dry skin and it was fantastic! The new one does basically nothing. It doesn't help diaper rash at all. It's super runny. I also noticed that no where on the packaging does it claim to be “non-nano”. The old one was and that was very important to me! I'm assuming this one is not? Anyway, I bought it twice trying to give it a shot, but I will no longer be purchasing this. I will have to find another brand. Honest Company - please bring back the old formula if possible!!! <3

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.review_text: This diaper rash cream has been a lifesaver! It glides on so smoothly and instantly creates a protective barrier that keeps my baby's skin soft, dry, and irritation-free. I love that it's made with clean, gentle ingredients that I can trust. I noticed a huge difference in calming redness and soothing discomfort. Gifted by thehonestcompany

reviews.title: Claming cream
reviews.review_text: Gifted by honest This is one of the best dipper cream . I sometimes use it for my dry hands and works great for my skin Totally recommend this clean cream One of the best things about this cream is that it's hypoallergenic and free from harsh chemicals like parabens, synthetic fragrances, and petroleum, making it a safe choice for babies with sensitive skin. It spreads easily, but it is on the thicker side, which is great for long-lasting protection. I noticed that it helps calm redness quickly, and with consistent use, it prevents further irritation. The only downside is that, like most zinc-based creams, it can be a bit difficult to wipe off completely.

reviews.title: Great cream.
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Honest: The honest company doesn't disappoint. I got this diaper rash cream for my newborn and it has quickly become the one that I carry with me on the go. It has been a great preventative cream as well as helps relieve redness when I see it coming. So far very satisfied.

reviews.title: Change formula - DISHONEST
reviews.review_text: SUCH A DISAPPOINTMENT to see a new formula with several synthetic ingredients, compared to the old formula with ALL recognizable and non-synthetic ingredients, rending this product similar to others on the shelf yet double the price. Change your formula, change your name! You are no longer “honest”…

reviews.title: Awesome natural product!
reviews.review_text: Gifted by the honest company for my honest review. This diaper rash cream is a game-changer! It goes on smoothly, keeps my baby's skin soft and dry, and provides instant soothing relief for irritation. I love that it's made with a gentle, hypoallergenic formula—definitely a must-have for happy, healthy skin!

reviews.title: Not good
reviews.review_text: We used the blue diaper cream for two years until within the last month we couldn't find it. The green is not good at all. Runny and doesn't heal the diaper rash. No idea why they pulled the blue cream, it was amazing and better than many types we tried. Please bring it back.

reviews.title: WHY DID YOU CHANGE THE FORMULA!?!?
reviews.review_text: This new formula is TERRIBLE! I've been using this same brand for 8 years, throughout my 3 kids. I went and got a new bottle last week and the ingredients are totally different. It no longer has that nice smell of essential oils. It's watery and runny, unlike the last formula which was thick. And my son had developed a nasty rash, which had NEVER happened before. Very upset about this and will never buy from this brand again.

reviews.title: Amazing Product
reviews.review_text: I have been using honest products since I had my first child which is over 7 years ago. Love everything I tried from them and so happy that this company exists. This diaper rash cream is amazing, so smooth , my baby's skin feels so smooth and it does not irritate at all like some other products I have tried in the past. Highly recommend this product. Gifted by honest company

reviews.title: Bring back the old formula!!
reviews.review_text: I used to absolutely love this diaper rash cream! It smelled wonderful, had great ingredients, and most importantly soothed my baby's diaper rash. This new formula is nowhere near as good as the old one. It used to be one of the few creams that got rid of diaper rash seemingly overnight, but now it seems to cause more harm.

reviews.title: Awful new formula!
reviews.review_text: This new formula is a huge disappointment. The ingredients are awful and the consistency leads to severe diaper rash. I'm not sure why such a drastic change was made but we now need to use a different cream after using this one for both of our daughters!

reviews.title: Best rash cream
reviews.review_text: This is perfect for sensitive skin. It really helps to sooth redness and protects against diaper rashes. It's not sticky and applies smoothly on baby skin. I'm really satisfied that I can choose a product that is clean to put on my baby. Complimentary from the honest company

reviews.title: New formula is grainy and not great!
reviews.review_text: I have been using the original diaper cream (the blue designs in the tube) and loved it. Super smooth, and it really helped prevent and cure diaper rash on my daughter. The new formula is super grainy, it leaves little pebbles on my daughter's skin even after being on her all night. And I can feel the little pebbles when I put it on. I used to swear by the old formula - why change a good thing?! Please bring back the old formula!!! I'm returning the two tubes of the new formula that I have and will find something else.

reviews.title: Horrible diaper cream!
reviews.review_text: They have changed their diaper cream and it's not for the better! This new diaper cream is giving our newborn a horrible rash! I put it on after every diaper change and it's not helping but making the rash even worse! It's so thin compared to the old formula!

reviews.title: A lifesaver!
reviews.review_text: Gifted by thehonestcompany. This diaper rash cream has been a lifesaver! The formula is gentle yet effective, providing quick relief for my baby's irritated skin. I love that it contains zinc oxide and the Soothing Phyto-Blend™, which helps protect and heal without harsh chemicals. It spreads smoothly and absorbs well, creating a strong barrier against moisture. Plus, it's free from fragrances, silicones, and other questionable ingredients, making it perfect for sensitive skin. Within just a few uses, I noticed a big improvement. A must-have for every diaper bag!

reviews.title: Hydrating
reviews.review_text: I can't comment on how well this works on active diaper rashes. However, I like to coat my daughter‘s bottom at night so that way she doesn't develop a diaper rash. From what we've used it looks like it's doing a great job at preventing diaper rashes and kept her nice and dry. Gifted by honest

reviews.title: Very moisturizing!
reviews.review_text: Complimentary from thehonestcompany: I liked this product, definitely one of the better diaper creams I've tried. Goes on super smooth and is quite moisturizing. Also was easier to wash off than others which can be difficult to remove even in the tub.

reviews.title: Just great
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the DIAPER RASH CREAM, SENSITIVE from Honest, and I'm impressed! This cream is a lifesaver for soothing irritation caused by diaper rash. It provides gentle yet effective relief while deeply moisturizing and nurturing my baby's delicate skin. The texture is smooth, easy to apply, and absorbs well without feeling greasy. I also love that it's made with clean ingredients, giving me peace of mind about what I'm putting on my baby's skin. Highly recommend for any parent looking for a safe and effective diaper rash solution! Complimentary from The Honest Company.

reviews.title: Uses zinc oxide which is the gold standard
reviews.review_text: Easy to apply and made for sensitive skin. It felt very silky applying and made my baby's diaper rash better the next day. No complaints! Fragrance-free! Uses zinc oxide which is the gold standard in diaper rash creams but made with soothing ingredients to give it that nice application and to make sure your baby is comfortable while healing. Complimentary from Honest for an honest review.

reviews.title: New formula is awful
reviews.review_text: Just bought three of these (two for home, one for daycare) and it's awful. I used the old formula for both kids and it was amazing, but this new formula seems to make rashes worse/provides no protection. After a couple of days of use my little one screamed when getting diaper changes because her bottom was so raw. We will no longer use or recommend this cream.

reviews.title: The best diaper cream!
reviews.review_text: This diaper cream works wonders for our little guy. It goes on like a thick lotion and is not sticky like other creams we've tried. It stays on his bottom well even with a diaper on. We use this regularly on a daily basis and our baby has never had a diaper rash!

reviews.title: It was ok
reviews.review_text: This was gifted by thehonestcompany and have tried it before and now and I don't think it works as good as another non toxic one that I am using. My daughter is 3 months old and we've gone through 3 tubes of diaper rash cream since she was born bc she pooped a lot in the beginning and honest was one of them but we recommend another brand instead.

reviews.title: Go back to the old formula.
reviews.review_text: SO sad that they changed their diaper cream. The old one is literally the only cream that worked on my babies. Would notice they were red and put the cream ion and by the next diaper change it would be better! Why change it when it was amazing?? Very bummed.

reviews.title: change of ingredients ruined the best diaper cream
reviews.review_text: As others have pointed out the new formula is causing a lot of diaper rash whereas with the old formula there was never an instance of diaper rash in over 2 years of use.There is no technique to use this watery mess of a cream that ever seems correct. I am so confused that this subpar product made it through product testing at Honest. The move away from beeswax and seed oils to an alphabet of chemicals was a poor choice.

reviews.title: Gentle
reviews.review_text: Recieved complimentary from The Honest Company. This is a good diaper rash cream. I appreciate that its free from all the harmful ingredients and has no fragrance. My baby never gets terrible diaper rash but does get red from time to time. This helps to keep his skin protected. Its gentle and good for his sensitive skin.

reviews.title: Best Clean Diaper Cream

reviews.title: Bring back the old formula!!
reviews.review_text: So disappointed in this formula change, if I could leave less stars I would !! :( Bring the old one back!!! We exclusively bought this diaper cream for our kids, but since the change it has been nothing but disappointing. It is not runny, thin, doesn't coat well or stick (comes off immediately when you put the diaper on, which is half the purpose) and just frankly doesn't work even half as well as the old formula. We do not have much money extra these days laying around to waste, as I'm sure most others don't either; but would specifically make trips or spend the extra money to get this cream because it used to work that well, plus we liked the smell of the old one. Now 'm searching for alternatives now.

reviews.title: Bring back the original formula!
reviews.review_text: Like many others here, I loved the original formula. At first I thought it was a fluke when I tried the new formula, but no; three tubes in and they're all the same awful, runny, non-homogenized consistency. Applying it is always a stressful and messy time. Looks like it's time to switch brands unfortunately.

It's clear that many others agree that this new sensitive one isn't worth it. When honest goes back to the old formulation I'll buy them again.

I saw new packaging and different ingredients but I still decided to try it. I'm so disappointed and sad they changed the formula. It is nothing special anymore and not effective for my child.

reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] My baby has a super sensitive bum. this diaper cream really helps him not get a painful rash. Made of good ingredients and safe for every day use. This is truly a life saver. Goes on easily and doesn't stink.

reviews.title: works
reviews.review_text: I'm going through radiation and chemo for rectal cancer and as an adult very imbarassing to discuss. well I have major radiation burns on my bottom and needed some protection and ease of pain. this was recommended by a young mother. its expensive but made my life much more tolerable.

reviews.title: Gentle and effective diaper rash cream
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I tried the honest diaper rash cream on my little and its been effective so far. I noticed some redness gone after 1 day and my boy's happy. The cream is thick and easy to spread, it doesnt leave any sticky residue on his butt. And also it made his skin hydrated and soft. The cream comes in small container, good size for carry around. Plus, this Honest brand is NSF certified and cruelty free which aligns with good for environment and ethical. Highly recommended!

reviews.title: Great diaper cream
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I really like this diaper cream, it spreads very well and evenly. The scent is pleasant and it is in a nice little tube which is convenient for on the go. I trust the honest company to have quality ingredients for my baby.

reviews.title: Not good formula

I would not use this cream again

reviews.title: Honestly Perfect for Babies
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I love this diaper cream and feel comfortable applying it to my baby's bum everyday. It has a very slight scent, is soft, has sage ingredients, and a soft texture. I highly recommend for moms who want a sage product for their babies.

reviews.title: Creamy Smooth & Fragrance Free
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is hands down the best diaper rash cream I have tried. It is extremely creamy and smooth, with an ointment like consistency. I love that its fragrance free, as I don't like using chemicals on my baby. The formula is also not chalky, so it's easy to clean off my fingers, as well as babies bottom. Don't hesitate to try it!

reviews.title: Do not recommend!
reviews.review_text: I was a loyal customer of this diaper cream for 4 YEARS until they changed the formula :( now I'm searching for a new one, sadly. It's awful, makes the rash worse and the consistency is terrible. Stay away! Honest, please bring back the original formula- it was amazing!!! Listen to your consumers please! Us moms want the original back! Please!!!!

reviews.title: Average diaper cream
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is a zinc-based diaper cream for sensitive skin. Works well as a diaper cream but is essentially just a zinc paste. Good moisture barrier for kiddos in diapers. Smell is neutral and it was easy to apply.

reviews.title: Perfect for a regular routine of diaper changing
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This diaper rash cream works pretty well into my baby skin, as a daily cream! it's non fragrance , the texture is soft and helps my Little one with sensitive skin. The packaging is helpful and easy to transport everywhere. I appreciate a lot that the expiration date and the time after opening is very clear to keep and eye on what we use on our baby. If my baby have a bad rash moment I use something more powerful but for everyday and helps to prevent and protect this one is great!

reviews.title: Bring back the old formula!!!!
reviews.review_text: The only diaper rash cream that worked like a dream, with natural ingredients at a good price point, until the formula changed with the new packaging. Honestly, why? I feel very disappointed and now once more to trial and error and hopefully I find a good diaper rash cream with natural ingredients, hmm there's one in mind I used to buy before, Mother love diaper balm, the only thing is that's quite pricey.

reviews.title: Great cream excellent for sensitive skin
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Excellent diaper rash cream for everyday use. Works extremely well and better than the usual name brands. Smells better and I love how it's for sensitive skin to better protect. Definitely my new favorite go to now. Thanks so much!

reviews.title: Great unscented cream
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] My son was experiencing a little redness so I was able to test this at the perfect time. It's not too thick. My favorite part of this cream is that it is unscented!! the product was easy to use in the tube - not too much came out at once. He didn't seem to have any adverse reaction to the cream and he seemed a little less red after use. I'll continue to use

reviews.title: Works!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This diaper cream is great. My daughter woke up with a slight rash, and this cleared it up in a few hours. The scent is very mild and it is very thick and a small amount covered the entire affected area just fine. I like the simple packaging, as well.

reviews.title: Zinc oxide vs petrolatum
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I liked the diaper rash cream. My baby doesn't have bad diaper rash but I used it for a little redness and to prevent rash. I like it less than the petrolatum ointment I have because it's white, so it's more visible if I wanted to use it for drool rash in the neck as well. It's also a little messy and has kind of a weird smell. Overall I'll use it, and since it's zinc oxide I wonder if it would have an off-label use as sunblock? - but I wouldn't re-buy.

reviews.title: Quick repair
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] We had been fighting a terrible diaper rash for a few days when I remembered I had this product to test. It was the perfect size for our diaper bag. The consistency of the cream was great. It glided on nicely and coated the effected area. Some creams seem to be too runny and have a hard time staying in the right spot or they barely spread if they are on the drier side. Had no problem at all and the rash cleared up quickly.

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I love honest brand! This diaper rash cream is a life saver!! It's great for everyday use. It's soothing and soft. The scent is mild. I love the ingredients because they are natural. The packaging is simple and cute. I love ❤️ this brand!!

reviews.title: Poor formula
reviews.review_text: I had the same experience as the other one star reviewers… the formula for the past year and half has been a miracle worker. But the last tube I just tried to use was watery and a weird color. I couldn't bring myself to use it on my baby. I figured maybe it expired or got hot in shipping or something but the other reviewers had the same experience it sounds like, and mentioned a formula change (which I didn't realize). Regardless, this is not the diaper cream to get right now.

reviews.title: Natural remedies
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This super rash cream is great! It is hypoallergenic which is great for my sensitive kidddos. Has no scent which is awesome! The packaging is cute shows that it's all natural. The texture is like any other rash cream. But over all a very well product really helped with my kids rashes. 8/10

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I really liked the diaper rash cream. I like that it was not harsh on my babies skin but definitely cleared up any diaper rash that she had. It is fragrance free which is a plus. I will definitely use this in the future.

reviews.title: Ideal for existing rashes or preventing them.
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I absolutely love Honest products, and their diaper rash cream is no exception. This cream has become my go-to for traveling, thanks to its convenient small size. It's perfect for on-the-go use, whether we're heading to swimming classes or traveling, like our recent trip to Colombia. One of the best features of this cream is that it's fragrance-free. I appreciate not having to deal with any strong odors, which can be overwhelming with other products. The texture is wonderfully soft, and it applies smoothly to my baby's skin, providing a creamy barrier that soothes and protects her delicate skin. Overall, this diaper rash cream has exceeded my expectations. It's effective, gentle, and ideal for travel. I highly recommend it to any parent looking for a reliable and portable solution for diaper rash.

reviews.title: Clean and gentle diaper rash cream
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Thanks Influenster and Honest for this product - diaper rash cream. This cream is made with Zinc Oxide, the main ingredient helps reduce and soothe irritation. It is also fragrance free, perfect for my baby with sensitive skin. Would recommend.

reviews.title: Diaper rash cream
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I think this is a very good product I love it so much it scent good with natural ingredients and healthy I love the packaging and the texture is so wonderful and soft it's very effective for sensitive skin rash

reviews.title: Great for sensitive bums
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Honest Sensitive Everyday Diaper Rash cream is great to have in my diaper changing arsenal. I love that it's vegan and hypoallergenic. It doesn't bother my daughter's sensitive skin. It definitely helped her red bum but I haven't tried it on bad diaper rash yet.

reviews.title: Must have diaper rash cream for sensitive skin !!!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] After trying this product it is very effective to use on my baby's skin for diaper rash it's texture is very soft and not too thick and it haves no scent for baby's sensitive skin and good made package.

reviews.title: Changed Formula?
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately like other reviews, with the new “look” I also think the formula was changed. Consistency is thinner and doesn't work as effectively as the old look did. The old stuff we could put some on and diaper rash would be gone fast. This stuff does not do that. Huge bummer!

reviews.title: Good
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Good brand but it's over priced to me. It works as well as any other brand and even generic which I tend to buy more generic to save costs. I get this has better ingredients though. Packaging is good, and it's easy to apply it's soft and creamy. Overall it's good

reviews.title: The key ingredient, zinc oxide, is known for its protective and healing properties, and it works wonderfully in calming and preventing diaper rash. What I appreciate most is the organic formulation. It's free from harmful chemicals and irritants, making i
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The key ingredient, zinc oxide, is known for its protective and healing properties, and it works wonderfully in calming and preventing diaper rash. What I appreciate most is the organic formulation. It's free from harmful chemicals and irritants, making it safe and gentle for my baby's sensitive skin.

reviews.title: Easy to spread
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Got to try for free. Works great. Easy to apply and smooth around. We use qtips so it doesn't get all over my hands. Trusty to have in the diaper bag. We use it to treat rashes and prevent them. It's comparable to Aquaphor that we've been using before this.

reviews.title: Limited ingredients
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I liked how the product is fragrance free. The foil protective part was hard to remove in one try for opening. It left the clear film behind. Ingredients looked great and minimal aside from the sunflower oil but much cleaner than many other brands. It applied easily and didn't seem so thick once rubbed in

reviews.title: Disappointing new formula
reviews.review_text: So disappointed. I used to buy a few tubes at a time with the old formula to keep more than one on hand because it worked like a charm and we couldn't go without. It cleared up a bad diaper rash in 1 day. It was thicker and was soothing for my baby. The new formula is not as thick and hasn't worked at all. We've had a bad rash the last couple of days and it doesn't touch it. I'm so disappointed. I had finally found what worked and now I am in search for a cream that will work. I will no longer use this cream it's an absolute waste since the formula has changed. Please go back to the original formula.

reviews.title: Hypoallergenic
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Honest Diaper Rash Cream is a popular choice among parents for its gentle yet effective formula. It's made with natural ingredients like zinc oxide and organic oils, which help soothe and protect baby's delicate skin. The cream creates a barrier against moisture, preventing and healing diaper rash effectively. its hypoallergenic and fragrance-free formula, suitable for sensitive skin.

reviews.title: an amazing all natural choice!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I was so excited to try this rash cream, as it is honestly super rare to find rash creams that don't contain harmful ingredients. I love that it is petroleum free & I can feel at ease using this product on my baby. There is virtually no scent, which i also love. It's got a creamy and thick texture, without being too thick to spread easily. This worked super well at protecting my baby's skin from moisture overnight & treating an existing rash she already had. The only thing i don't like is how small the bottle is, but i would still purchase this again.

reviews.title: Great diaper cream!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is my favorite diaper cream! It's great on sensitive skin, it's unscented, and it's a very nice consistency. I love that there are no harmful ingredients in it and you can feel good about using it on your baby. It works great for diaper rash and I would most definitely purchase again!

reviews.title: Just amazing.
reviews.review_text: If I could give this cream more stars I definitely would. My son had two bad rashes the first one in his private area it was everywhere even to where his skin was peeling and the second one all over his but bright red he was in pain he couldn't crawl sit nothing he just wanted to stand all day long. I went to the doctors for his first one and they gave us prescription cream and it made him break out even worse! I got this cream and was gonna give it a go mind you I've used absolutely everything else before I went to his doctor everything kept making it just worse and worse my son is very sensitive to a lot of products. This this cream right here is the only thing I will be using right when I put it on it soothes him he was able to move and groove all around and within 1 whole day of using it his rash was completely gone. Love love love this cream.

reviews.title: A must-have diaper rash cream!!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I absolutely hands down love this diaper rash cream. The texture is a great smooth paste that applies so easily and well. There is a slight scent that smells fresh and clean. This diaper rash cream works so well to stop, heal, and prevent new diaper rash.

reviews.title: Must have
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I have 2 kids in diapers so diaper rash cream is always in demand. I like that this one didn't contain any harmful chemicals and was very gentle on my little ones skin. It glides smoothly and doesn't come off in a diaper. Overall I highly suggest to try it!

reviews.title: Great product
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Overall nice product. It goes on very nicely and doesn't leave a sticky residue like others. I found it useful both for prevention and treatment of diaper rashes for my 19 month old! Will continue to use!

reviews.title: Great cream that works very well
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The cream works so well. I can notice the difference on baby after one day. The key ingredient is known for not only healing, soothing the rash, but also preventing the rash in the future. The most important is it's organic ingredient, soothing and not harmful for baby's skin.

reviews.title: A staple in our changing station
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Honest diaper rash cream is a staple in our changing station. With ingredients we moms can trust to soothe our little ones this cream is a great go to. Fast acting to help calm and heal those stubborn rashes.

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I love this rash cream, the brand is super good, the product works wonderfully, it helps relieve those terrible baby rashes super quickly, I use it with my baby and after a while he feels better, the ingredients are super natural and recommended for the sensitive skin of babies, the aroma is pleasant and the dense texture. Super recommended if you have small babies

reviews.title: Gentle and Effective
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I must say, I am thoroughly impressed. As a parent, I always prioritize the well-being of my little one, especially when it comes to skincare products. This diaper rash cream has quickly become a staple in our daily routine, and for all the right reasons. One of the first things that caught my attention about the Honest Diaper Rash Cream is its impressive list of ingredients. I love that it is made with natural and safe ingredients, giving me the peace of mind that I am using a product that is gentle on my daughter's delicate skin. It's a relief to know that I can apply this cream daily without any worry about harsh chemicals or irritants. The texture of this diaper rash cream is another standout feature for me. The thick consistency ensures that it stays in place and provides a protective barrier on my daughter's skin. Even when she wets her diaper, the cream doesn't easily rub off, offering long-lasting protection against irritation and redness. I appreciate how well it works to soothe and prevent diaper rash, making it a reliable solution for daily use.

reviews.title: Great diaper rash cream!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This diaper rash cream is great for your little ones who have sensitive skin. It is fragrance free which is a plus. Packaging is durable and easily can fit into any diaper bag for in the go. Helps to clear any diaper rash.

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.review_text: Worst. Please bring back original formula. This stuff is crap. Id rather buy chemical desitin than this. Go back or start to lose your customers. We arent stupid. Its rude to think you can change the formula and we wont notice. This is white tinted sunflower oil. It doesn't help on diaper rash at all. Its just terrible.

reviews.title: Effective for All Ages
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] As a parent, finding the right diaper rash cream that not only soothes but also protects your baby's delicate skin is crucial. I stumbled upon [Diaper Rash Cream Brand] and have been thoroughly impressed. Not only does it work wonders for my little one, but I've also found it to be incredibly effective for adults. The gentle yet powerful formula provides quick relief from diaper rash discomfort, while also creating a protective barrier against moisture and irritation. Its versatility extends beyond just babies – it's become a go-to solution for minor skin irritations and chafing for adults as well. I appreciate the hypoallergenic and fragrance-free nature of the cream, ensuring it's gentle even on the most sensitive skin. Plus, the ease of application and quick absorption make it practical for busy parents and individuals alike

reviews.title: Great product from a great brand.

Honest products are great and do not irritate the skin. I love the size of this bottle, it's perfect for the diaper bag since it's not too bulky.

My son did not react well to one of the ingredients so it won't work for him but it seems like a good diaper rash cream regardless. I wish the tube was a little bigger for the price.

reviews.title: Best products

reviews.title: Scent free diaper cream
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is a nice, thick diaper rash cream. It has zinc oxide in it so it stays put but also easy to rub in if needed. There is no scent and the packaging allows for control in how much cream comes out of the tube.

reviews.title: “Ew, yucky!” -my 2.5 yr old
reviews.review_text: As other reviewers have said, the formula has changed and it is so terrible now! Runny and watery. The second I put some on my finger it runs down to my palm. Never mind trying to apply to a wiggly toddler's bottom. The old formula was perfect, thick and spread well. And always cleared up the first sign of diaper rash by the next diaper change. This new formula does little to reduce redness and irritation. My son even says “ew yucky” whenever I squeeze it out of the tube. Even he knows! Change the formula back please!

reviews.title: Honest diaper rash cream
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I love Honest products since the ingredients are fragrance free and for sensitive skin. My baby use the Honest wipes and her skin is better than using other types. The effective for the diaper cream takes few days only to help with the rash. It absorbs into the skin fast and I love how moisture it is after done.

reviews.title: The Honest Company Diaper Rash Cream is an effective and natural solution for treating and preventing diaper rash in babies.
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I received this Honeat Company Diaper Rash Cream for free as part of an incentivized program in exchange for my honest review. The Honest Company Diaper Rash Cream uses organic shea, jojoba, tamanu, and coconut oils to moisturize and nurture the skin. The formula also contains non-nano zinc oxide, which helps reduce redness, inflammation, and protect chafed skin. It works well to soothe irritation and clear up diaper rash quickly. The hypoallergenic and plant-based formula is gentle on sensitive skin. Some users note that it helps create a protective barrier and makes diaper changes easier. Overall, the Honest Company Diaper Rash Cream seems to be a high-quality, natural option for managing and preventing diaper rash in babies. The combination of moisturizing oils and zinc oxide appears to be effective at providing relief and promoting healing.

reviews.title: Works great!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] My baby's teething hard and as a result he keeps getting diaper rashes... This stuff is great and has helped a lot! It's hypoallergenic and vegan friendly. It's also fragrance free for sensitive skin. It soothes and hydrates while healing the skin! Great formula!

reviews.title: Buttery
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I reallyyy like this rash cream. A little goes a long way. It's thick but spreads easily because it starts to melt with the heat of your skin. Once it's soaks in, or if you wipe off the excess, the skin where you applied is so buttery soft

reviews.title: Don't change it if it's not broken.
reviews.review_text: I LOVED, key word: LOVED this diaper rash cream. I would tell everyone to get it. Honest ingredients and it worked like a dream. When I noticed the new packaging I didn't think much of it until we used it and I noticed it just seemed different. Decided to compare ingredients and it's a complete formula change. The most important thing, it does not work like the old one! Don't waste your time in trying the new cream. Unfortunately we will be looking for another diaper rash. I'm hoping they see these reviews and change it back!

reviews.title: Great at calming!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I love the honest diaper rash cream! It doesn't have fragrance or anything harmful in it. It goes on smoothly and is easy to get out of the tube. Doesn't cause irritation, it helps with it. Love this stuff!
